entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EST Saturday 25 March 2023
